Title: Inside Track
Writer: Aaron Korsh (created by), Aaron Korsh, Ethan Drogin (executive story editor), Rick Muirragui (executive story editor)
Actors: Gabriel Macht, Patrick J. Adams, Rick Hoffman, Meghan Markle
Plot: Harvey asks Mike to find a loophole so that he can oust the incoming CEO of a motor company he represents, while Louis puts outrageous demands on Mike as he tries to make arrangements for the Rookie Dinner.
